meanings.definition: Small pieces of meat or vegetables grilled on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed delicious brochettes at the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served flavorful brochettes with a side of rice.
meanings.sent3: The brochettes on the grill looked like colorful food swords.
meanings.sent4: The skewers of brochettes sizzled over the hot coals.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the brochettes cooking made everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: Skewers used for grilling small pieces of meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Dad grilled the brochettes on metal skewers.
meanings.sent2: The wooden brochettes held the marinated meat perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The brochettes on the skewers resembled tasty food wands.
meanings.sent4: The brochettes on the skewers danced with the flames.
meanings.sent5: The skewers of brochettes added a delightful aroma to the air.
